name: Circle of Harmony
description:
Circle of Harmony is a puzzle game with strategic elements.

  • Choose the best position for your animals to achieve a higher score. 
  • Collect points to fill the Circle of Harmony and get new animals to place in the savannah.
  • Each of your actions will affect which animals you can choose in the future. If your world is unbalanced and one species dominates over others, you will get the opportunity to restore balance in the next moves.
  • Don't be afraid if the Game Over window appears. You can always undo your last moves and try another solution.
Controls

The mouse is the only control. 

  • Use Left-click to choose the next animal and to place it on a game field.
  • Use Right-click to cancel the placement of an animal.
Development history

The game was inspired by the games Islanders  and  Tiny Islands. The development was finished during the Devtober 2022 game jam. You can find DevLog of the game here.
